description:
Skip the mall and shop from your sofa. Get the #1 catalog shopping app. Named one of TIME's "50 Must-Have iPad Apps" of 2013, Catalog Spree lets you shop more than 350 retail brands from your iPhone and iPad.

Catalog Spree is the fast and fun way to browse, share and shop all your favorite brands like Bloomingdale’s, Forever 21, L.L.Bean, Macy’s, Neiman Marcus, Nordstrom, REI ...new catalogs are added every day!

Get your shopping fix for FREE - without going to the mall. Plus, cut down on paper waste from traditional catalogs.
- Discover exclusive lookbooks from brands like HauteLook, Forever 21, Gap and Stella & Dot
- Tap on any product in a catalog to buy it or save it to a shopping list.
- Add products to your Price Watch list and get alerts when prices drop.
- Easily share your favorite catalogs or products via Facebook, Pinterest and email.
- Get access to exclusive promos and deals.

Catalog Spree has been featured in People Magazine,  NBC's Today Show, iVillage, Time, InStyle Magazine, The Ellen DeGeneres Show, The NY Times, LA Times, Mashable, Inc.com, ELLE Décor, Yahoo! Shine, and many more. 

Here are some of the brands available on Catalog Spree:
Macy’s - Lands’ End - Nordstrom - Target - Forever 21 - Kohl’s - JCPenney - Delia’s - Eddie Bauer - The Land of Nod - Zales - Juicy Couture - Sephora - Pier 1 Imports  - Boston Proper - Hanna Andersson - Chico’s  - Shaper Image - L.L.Bean...and many more.
trackCensoredName: Catalog Spree – the #1 catalog shopping app with more than 350 catalogs
trackName: Catalog Spree – the #1 catalog shopping app with more than 350 catalogs
